1.content:
Emily was a 42 year old mother, with two daughters, Megan, and Sarah, age 15 and 17, and a son Davis, who just turned 12. Her husband of 20 years Jason was 45 years old.

She had taken the day off because of feeling under the weather. Emily stretched out her slender 5'10" body on the couch. Her dirty blonde hair pulled up in a mess bun.

At some point she drifted off into a deep sleep. When she stirred awake she was no longer on the couch, but in front of it.

Pushing to her feel she instantly knew something was wrong. The couch, and everything else towered above her. In her sleep she somehow shrank to barely a quarter of an inch tall.

"This can't be real!" She said in shock standing next to her own discarded size 10 sandals.

She struggled to fully believe that this wasn't a dream. While it all felt real, she knew it simply couldn't be. Even as she walked around the couch, and felt the cold floor under her bare feet she doubted this as reality.

The detail was just too accurate to be a dream she thought. "But, there's just no way." She said, her voice lacking conviction.

The metallic sound of the doorknob turning drew her undivided attention. The feeling in her throat was very real as she watch a massive figure stepping through the door.

She screamed at the sight of.....

Just as Emily makes her way into the kitchen there is a knock at the door. "Come on in." Jason shouts from the refrigerator.

Emily looks on confused as the door leading to the backyard opens. Their neighbor Stephanie stepped inside, with a slightly nervous look on her face. "Hey there." She said quietly, glancing around the room.

The quarter inch woman had no idea why her 31 year old neighbor would come over. They weren't friends, and rarely spoke at all. Yet now for whatever reason the slender, 5'3" brunette closed the door behind her as she moved into the room.

To Emily's shock Jason seemed happy to see Stephanie. His face lit up with a smile as Stephanie walked towards him. Her size 7 feet clad in Nike slides.

"I was surprised to get your text. Are you sure this is a good idea ?" Stephanie asked, her voice soft.

Jason smirked, with a slight shrug. "She hasn't answer my calls, or texts. She probably went to her sister's. Which means we have the house to ourselves for at least a few hours."

Emily couldn't believe what she was hearing and seeing. Jason was have an affair with the girl next door. Despite only being a quarter of an inch tall Emily was filled with rage.

"Fucking bitch!" She shouted at the top of her lungs.

Without thinking anything through the tiny woman charged the giantess. Her anger caused Emily to forget that compared to her Stephanie was now nearly 1500 feet tall, with over 200 foot long feet.

151.content:
"Hey sweetheart, its me!", Claire called softly into the house, expecting the reply of her ill younger sister who she came to drop soup off for.

Upon hearing nothing, Claire removed her flats and placed her purse on the floor under the coat rack, and walked further inside with a pot of warm soup in her hands. Emily watched as her beloved older sister walked into the kitchen and set the pot on the countertop.

She began to run , scream, and wave her hands as she approached the threshold that seperates the wood plank floor of the living room, to the tile floor of the kitchen. She stood there and tried to no avail to call down her sisters attention.

"Oh god Claire!!! Please help me, Im down here!", she cried.

Suddenly, Claire began to step towards Emilys position on the floor with large booming steps that quaked the ground! Claires bare foot nearly misses flattening Emily into paste, only just avoiding Claire's big toe! In a panic, Emily rushed to the relative safety of hiding behind the leg of a nearby chair, while Claire continued with a couple more steps until she reached the couch.

She was a little confused. Her sister had texted her that she was taking a day off her work because she felt sick, but shes not even home? Claire looked down at the couch, noticing the cushions were imprinted as if a person was recently laying on it. She was here all right. Maybe she went upstairs to fetch a blanket or just pass out on her own bed? Claire couldnt hear any movement anywhere in the house, with the kids at school and Jason at work, it was dead silent. It was odd, but Claire really didnt pay it much mind. Between Emily and their youngest sister, Ashley, she had gotten used to taking care of them and being taken for granted, especially for her time. They were lucky they were her sisters, in more ways than one.

Claire didn't have any plans until later on in the day, so she decided to wait for Emily to finish doing whatever she was doing and wait for her here. She sends her a quick text.

'im here. Just downstairs '

Then Claire sits down on the worked in couch and turns on the T.V.

Meanwhile, Emily was still awe struck that something so impossible was happening to her right now. How could it be real? This is movie shit, wasnt it? Not real life. But despite how outlandish this whole situation was, Emily knew it wasnt a dream or a figment of the brain of any kind. This really was happening, and now her giant sister was the only one she could turn to for help right now.

But how should she go about it? No matter how you slice it, danger was going to be a factor. Who knows what threats besides a giant stomping woman would rear their ugly heads at little Emily. Even the notion of crossing a floor seemed to instill fear in her heart. But there was little choice. She had to do something or live under this chair until she gets vaccuumed up.

Emily considers trying to go to Claires purse, which was resting on the ground by the entrance. It would be a big walk, but if she could get inside it would keep her pretty safe until she could get Claire's attention. Speaking of Claire, Emily could aslo head right for her directly.
151.title: Colossal Claire

Her fingers were tapping the table, and the bangle on her wrist clinked against the counter, although at Emily's size the giant piece of metal sounded more like a thud.

"It's a shame you aren't any use to Jason anymore, not that you were much use in the first place," Karen said, her wide blue eyes staring down at the pathetic shrunken woman.

Suddenly, Emily heard a loud growling sound. She whipped her head left and right wondering where it came from, before Karen started rubbing her tummy and she realized what it was.

"Oooh," said Karen, and she broke out into a wicked smile, "But I know how you'll be of use to me."

She licked her lips, and Emily screamed and jumped away as two thin fingers dove toward her.

"Come back here you worthless little pest!" Karen raged.

A giant hand blocked Emily's field of view, and she screamed and covered her eyes as it closed around her. She felt herself being pulled up, up past Karen's tummy, past her slim neck, up before her face.

Emily shivered despite the wet, warm air that washed over her. She opened her eyes in spite of herself, and Karen's cavernous maw loomed before her. The mouth closed into a grin, and Karen giggled through perfect white teeth.

Emily couldn't believe it. Karen had decided she was worthless enough that she was going to swallow her as a little snack. All her ambitions with her family and husband, and she was destined to digest in a much older woman's paunchy belly.

"I hope the mashed potatoes give you a soft landing," said Karen, as she lifted Emily into her mouth...
15313.title: On to the kitchen counter.

153131.content:
Emily flew past Karen's lips and landed face-first on a bumpy surface. It was dark in here, but she could feel wet, humid breath and see light shine from behind her.

The surface undulated slightly under her, just as she was trying to stand, so she fell face-first down again. Then, the huge tongue lifted her up. She could feel the texture of Karen's upper mouth as the tongue lightly dragged her against it. She forced herself not to descend into hysterical crying, not to give in to this bitch.

"MMMMMM."

Emily felt herself falling, the air cold on her wet skin. She landed in the middle of Karen's palm. She looked up into the giantess's eyes as a huge hand wiped away a rope of saliva connecting Emily to Karen's mouth. Emily shivered. She felt wet before, but now she was starting to feel sticky as the saliva she was drenched in started to dry.

The corners of Karen's thick, pale lips turned upward in a smirk. "Look at it this way, hun. You might be a pathetic excuse for a wife, but at least you taste good."

Emily screamed as the giant hand flung her back into Karen's mouth. This time, the tongue angled up, and she felt her feet getting sucked into the beginning of Karen's throat with an ear-popping "GLUNK."

Emily flailed, trying to turn around and get a hold on Karen's taste buds, but her hand just smacked against Karen's huge uvula, dangling above her head. With another hard swallow, Emily sank to her face, feeling the constricting wet throat around her lower body.

She screamed again, but it was quickly muffled when suddenly her face met the wet wall of Karen's throat.

She started to feel tired, struggling against throat muscles that were probably way bigger than her. She may be a younger, fairly healthy woman, but even this giantess's old worn muscles totally overpowered her pathetic body.

As she was despairing, her legs suddenly kicked free in hot, humid air, and then her whole body plummeted.

Splat! Right into the mashed potatoes like Karen had said. She struggled to claw her way free of the mush, and something immediately splashed in her face. She struggled to wipe it off, but the stomach juices burned.

Even though it was pitch-black, she could hear a pool of stomach juices sloshing around the giantess's ridged lower belly. She struggled to climb on top of the mashed potatoes, also struggling not to puke, as she heard another wave coming. This one lapped at the glob of mashed potatoes, which started to divide in two.

Emily felt herself fall into another glob of digested mush. She couldn't tell what this was. The stomach around her smelled mostly of mashed potatoes, faintly of carrots, and some other sweet and bitter things the woman had consumed and imbibed earlier in the day. She could also hear the great organ make satisfied little gurgles and grumbles here and there.

The liquid pool washed over her again. Its intensely bitter smell clung to her, and she grabbed a handful of mashed potatoes, trying to wipe it off her face.

But it was useless, this was going to be her end here, in the stinky pit of Karen's stomach, destined to become maybe a couple calories at most. She was already starting to run out of what little air was left in here. There was a rumbling sound as up above a burp escaped Karen's lips. That was the last of the air.

--

Karen just stood there, a wicked grin on her face. She twirled the end of her long, lush hair as she imagined what Emily was going through. She raised her hand to her mouth and gave a dainty little burp.

"Oh, I think that was the last of your air," she said, patting her tummy. "You were a tasty little morsel."

She laughed again at the idea of such a pathetic woman turning into her snack and walked out of the kitchen.
153131.title: Karen swallows Emily

choices: "Well, I'll leave you to your snack."
"Why don't we go out and grab brunch?"
153132.content:
Emily heard footsteps. Someone was about to walk into the kitchen.

"Shit," Karen hissed, spraying tiny (well, not tiny to Emily) globs of spittle on Emily. Emily felt Karen's warm hand suddenly tilt, and she plummeted into Karen's cleavage. She tumbled down the side of one of Karen's floppy, soft boobs. Sticking out her arms, she tried to grab a hold of something as she slid down Karen's wrinkled belly. Finally, she stopped on the hem of Karen's frilly underwear. Emily tried not to puke as she thought about how close she was to this older woman's sex. She looked upward. The crack of light coming in through Karen's neckline shone on an emerald pendant that hung deep between her breasts. Of course, there was no reaching that now, not with how small Emily's tiny, pathetic body was. The enormous wall of Karen's belly gave a terrifying, low grumble at being denied its tiny morsel.

"Have you seen Emily recently?" asked Jason. "I know she was taking a nap on the couch earlier, but I can't find her anywhere."

"Oh I'm sure she's somewhere close by," said Karen. Emily saw Karen's chest heave up and down as the giant lady giggled.

"It's really strange, I saw her clothes all dumped out on the floor."

"Why would she do that? That outfit looks great on her. Your wife is so cute I could just eat her up."

Emily couldn't see it, but Jason looked at his mother funny, not expecting to hear a compliment about his wife.

Karen giggled again. She took a few steps around the kitchen, and as she did so Emily held on tight to the hem of her underwear. She didn't know which was worse, tumbling across the older woman's underwear and possibly down her pant leg onto the floor to be stepped on, or to tumble inside it.

Karen's stomach gave another roar. Emily wished she had her hands free to plug her ears against Karen's rumbling guts, which were even louder inside her shirt than when she was outside it. She tried not to think about how fast she would digest at this size. Submerged in a pool of the older woman's stomach acids. Surrounded by the stink of this disgusting older woman's digesting food. She would be totally helpless.

"You sound hungry," said Jason, laughing.

"Well, I was about to get myself a little snack, but you interrupted me."

Jason replies:
153132.title: someone comes into the kitchen

choices: Kate dropped her phone under the couch
Emily made a break for it behind the couch
Kate starts talking to herself about whether the shrink potion worked
Emily decided to confront her sister-in-law
154.content:
Emily nearly screamed at the sight of who was walking through the door, the aunt to all of her children and her husband's sister, Kate. She was rather chubby, aged forty three years old and had naturally brunette hair that she dyed blonde to make herself seem more unique. Most importantly however, she shared Jason's mother's views on Emily, not thinking she was good enough for her older brother. Most of the time this could simply be ignored, and brushed off, but at this size she would love nothing more than to rid the family of what she deemed it's lowest member.

Emily cowered behind the couch as the giantess strolled into their home, setting her bags down before announcing her presence with what seemed to be a thunderous roar, but in reality was no more than a calling to whoever was home.

"Hey! Anyone here?! It's Aunt Kate!" She boomed, but to no answer. Emily watched her walk over to the couch, and sit on the large piece of furniture above the shrunken woman, slipping her shoes off and placing her dirty socks on the coffee table that Emily loved so much. Kate began to mumble to herself, saying "No wonder. The one job that bitch has is to hold down the fort and she can't even do that right." Emily was heated, wanting to go out and confront the rude guest, but held herself back, not wanting to be mistaken for a bug and crushed under Kate's socks, rubbed off onto the coffee table.

Instead,
154.title: Giant Sister-in-Law

1541.content:
As Emily weighed her options to wait for someone trustworthy to come home, she heard a large thud on the wooden floor in front of her, seeing the bright screen of Kate's phone laying face up a little ways away from her. She cowered in fear as the giant manicured hand started rummaging around, seeming like a monster's appendage at this size. Nothing she could do would have mattered, all she could do was wait as the hand retreated, and the feet got taken off the table.

It wasn't before long that the entirety of her sister-in-law's body was on the ground, and she lowered her gigantic face to the floor in order to see if she could spot what she was looking for. Quickly, the giantess pulled her phone away and to her surprise saw something right behind it, seeming to be afraid of herself. With a smile, she boomed over Emily.

"What is this?" She started. "If I didn't know better, I'd have thought I just spotted a little
1541.title: Giant Face

choices: Releasing Her Outside, Far From Home
Before She Could, Jason Came Home
15412.content:
"It looks as though my husband's skank wife has found herself underneath the couch." The giant Kate chuckled pulling Emily out with her free hand and standing back up. She brought the tiny wife to her face, examining the tiny woman's body with a grin pouring over her face, opening her lips to speak.

"I didn't know they made whores in all sizes." She laughed, hot air blasting over Emily's face, smelling like cigarettes.

"Put me down Kate! I'm not the one who goes trying to lure guys half my age at bars!" She protested, trying to free herself from the firm grip of her husband's sister.

"I don't think you're in any position to be name calling, pipsqueak. I do pity the widower my brother is going to be, but I'm sure one of my friends will make for a good stepmother, don't you?" She said, sitting back on the couch.

"What do you want Kate?!" Emily yelled, needing to know how to escape the scenario which was looking more and more grim as it went on.

"I wanted you out of the picture. It seems as though I already have that however." Kate said, setting her phone down and bringing her free hand to rub her chin in contemplation. "I have a lot of ideas for you, I really do. I think I have an idea to make sure you don't ever get back to my brother, ruining him with your antics." Emily gulped, and waited for Kate to announce her plan, soon revealed to be
15412.title: Spotted By An Angry Giant

choices: Spat Emily out, wanting to play some more
Swallowed Emily, sending her to the pits of her stomach
154121.content:
"I mean, it'd be super easy to just squash you under my foot." Kate started, looking down at her brother's wife. "But I feel as though their might be some DNA evidence, as weird as it might be for them to check my sneakers for that sort of thing. It's much safer to just swallow you, I'm sure nobodies going to be checking where you're going." She laughed, before bringing Emily upwards and tilting her head back. The tiny screamed as she was brought above the face of her sister-in-law, terrified of what she had intended.

Kate opened her mouth underneath Emily, letting the little woman get a good look of the cavern that lay beyond her lips as she stuck her tongue out in order to mock the girl. With her mouth as wide as she could get it, she began the slow descent of her prey, bringing her lower and lower until she crossed the barrier that her lips created between the outside world and inside her own body. Once inside Emily immediately felt more danger, with the moist hot air now encompassing all of her senses. She was helpless to do anything as Kate let go of her tiny prize, dropping her on to the giant tongue.

Emily was forced to try and stand up to get out, no doubt a great feat due to the slipperiness the surface of the tongue provided. She tried her best to crawl outwards, but Kate was having none of that, tilting her tongue upwards, acting as a slide for her snack to fall backwards, down towards the looming throat in the back of the mouth. Without a seconds notice, Kate
154121.title: Swallowed Whole

choices: Kate needs to make a few stops first
154123.content:
"Well, since sooner or later they're going to report you 'missing', I think it would be better to bring you home with me. Where we can have all the fun we want without anyone disturbing us."

"Without anyone disturbing us is right! No husband, a daughter who hates your guts, you must be so excited to finally have a guest, even though you shrunk me and forced me along!", Emily spat back.

Kates eyes furrowed as her grip tightened against Emily. Her ribs held back agaisnt the enormous pressure of Kates grip, more than enough to normally shatter bones, but somehow, despite the pain, Emily was fine. She figured that whatever shrunk her, also made her body more durable to damage. That would come in handy when it was time to escape this bitch of a sister-in-law.

Kate, after a few more seconds of contemplating whether to crush Emily into a pulp or not, loosened her grip, deciding to save all that for later. Air filled back into Emilys lungs as she rested her head on Kates forefinger.

"Awww, tired pipsqueak? Well you better get used to it. Theres plenty more where that came from!"

With her other hand, Kate reached into her purse and pulled put a used crumpled tissue, wrapping Emily into it like a burrito, only allowing her head to stick out, before keeping her immobile by tying an elastic band around her form. Kate then dumped the mini Emily into her purse and exited the house and went into her car.

"I hope your comfortable bitch.", Kate said, setting the purse onto the passenger seat. She then started up the car and exited the driveway.
154123.title: Kate takes Emily

choices: The baby sitter she hired, Jessie
155.content: The gargantuan guest stepped further into the room, allowing Emily to recognize the facial features more clearly!
155.title: Further selection of guests

choices: The kids run downstairs, Jessie moves to greet them
Emily hears a voice call out to her
1552.content:
Emily choked on her tongue as she fought to make any noise to emphasize just how intensely her body and mind were under such stress and fear, however she couldnt even force a scream out without it coming out rough like gravel! The young woman who stood at the doorway, a friends daughter Emily had hired during her day off at University. A gorgeous girl named Jessica, who prefered to be called Jessie for convenience.

Her slender, toned form, peeked from beside the open door as she continued to knock and call out for anyone to greet her.

"Hello? Mrs. Jones?", Jessie spoke soft and audible into the quiet house, hoping to catch someones ear. Very similarly to what Emily was currently attempting to do, only difference was the stakes. Emily screamed as loud as she possibly could until her throat began to feel like sandpaper. It goes without saying, but with Emily a room away, and the size of bug, her voice made it knowhere near the oblivious babysitter.

Eventually, Jessie let herself in and closed the door behind her. She kicked off her baby blue converses and neatly set them on the shoe matt by the door. She walked into the house on her black ballerina socks, while toting a dark blue book bag over her shoulder. She set the bag on the first tabletop she came across, then Emily watched as she reached into the front pocket of her distressed blue jeans and pulled out her cell phone.

" *GASP*, Phone! Right! Ugh Emily you idiot... okay, where is it?", Emily frantically began pulling the pockets out of her clothing as she searched. It wasnt with her! A migraine born of sheer stress began to pound into her cranium as Emily tried to recall where she left it! Her question was answered when suddenly, an series a rythmic vibrations begin to thump against the coffee table out of Emilys line of sight.

That answered two questions; where it was and whether it shrunk with her or not...

The sound of her own voice emitted from the phones speakers, asking the caller to leave a message. This attracts the attention of Jessie, who began crossing the room towards the sound of her employers voice. Booming foorsteps that sent quakes into the floor Emily stood on began to grow closer and more intense until Jessie stopped and picked the phone up in her free hand.

Emily could see the confusion in Jessies deep brown eyes from even down where she stood. No doubt, Jessie should be calling Jason next in order to get an explanation for their absence. She set Emilys phone back down, and raised her own phone back up to her ear, pushing her long brown hair aside to do so.

Emily stood on the ground about an arms length (normal sized arm) from the side of Jessies foot. It would be a long walk, but perhaps if she ran hard and prayed Jessie would keep still, she could get on the girls foot and wait for an opportunity to present itself where she could get someone to notice her.
1552.title: Paying by the hour

choices: "Its best we stick together. We need to get someones help."
Davis comes running down the stairs
15523.content:
Suddenly, Emily gasped! From behind her, she could hear a distressed voice calling out to her from underneath the coffee table. She turned her head to see two distant forms, the same size as her, running towards her, waving their arms and shouting! From this perspective, Emily recognized them as her two daughters, Megan and Sarah!

"Oh my god... Girls!? Are you okay?!", Emily yelled as she rushed to embrace her daughters. The family met between the coffee table and the sofa in hug to rule all hugs. Emily held her daughters tight as she bombarded them with questions.

"What are you two doing here? How did this happen?"

Sarah, who was doing a better job at fighting back tears than her sister, replyed to her mother with choked sobs.

"We,... Megan and I... we saw you were sleeping on the couch as we were heading out. So we thought it would be funny if we stuck a note on your head but... then you started to glow! And Megan touched you to see if she could wake you up then I touched her and then we blacked out and woke up like this!"

Emily was dumbfounded upon hearing this. Though this whole situation was batshit, so she supposed that warranted a batshit explanation. If she could even call it that. Her girl explained what had happened, but that still left why and how!

"Okay. Let me think for a second."

"Mom! Did you see Jessie! Shes a giant!", Megan cried.

"Yes sweetie I saw her. Just let me think..."

"She could step on us! We have to get put of here!"

"Megan! Enough! Fine, lets all move to the table leg over there."

The three of them moved quickly out of the open floor to the partial shelter beneath the table,... it would atleast keep them out of harms way while a plan was being formed.
15523.title: Emily hears a voice call out to her

info.brief_description: Emily shrinks without warning, around, family, friends, or complete strangers.
info.description:
Emily is very durable, but not invincible when shrunk. She could for instance survive being stepped on barefoot, or sat on, but not stomped on with a shoe, or survive being eaten. Keep this an unaware story as long as possible. Try not to end it too quickly. No one sentence chapters, or repeated choice chapters.

No unbirthing, diapers, or sexual content with children, though feet, vore, and crushing is allowed.

I'll delete anything that I don't care for, especially poorly written additions regardless of content.

Enjoy and please add.
